name: Bouncelot
description:
As a living ball, bounce on the walls and over the people to make it as high as you can before the time runs out. Hurry up!

Controls:

Left, right - Move

Z (A button) - Bounce hit

Hold A (X button) to restart.

Feedback:
This is not the final version, I will make more updates, such as hazards or more modes or more dimensions... who knows. So, let me know what you think about this current version of the game in the comments below. And thanks for playing!
